question: What is Geralt's name in different languages?
answer: In other languages, Geralt is known as: English: Geralt of Rivia Polish (original): Geralt z Rivii Arabic: جيرالت من ريفيا Brazilian Portuguese: Geralt de Rívia Bulgarian: Гералт от Ривия (Geralt ot Riviya) Chinese Simplified: 利维亚的杰洛特 (Lì wéi yǎ de jié luò tè) Croatian: Geralt od Rivije Czech: Geralt z Rivie Dutch: Geralt van Rivia Estonian: Riivimaa Geralt Farsi (Persian): گرالت از (اهل) رِویا Farasi گرالت اهل ریویا Finnish: Geralt Rivialainen French: Geralt de Riv Georgian: გერალტი რივიიდან German: Geralt von Riva Greek: Γκέραλτ της Ριβίης (Gkéralt ti̱s Rivíi̱s) Hebrew: גראלט מריוויה Hungarian: Ríviai Geralt Italian: Geralt di Rivia Japanese: リヴィアのゲラルト (Rivia no Geraruto) Latvian: Geralts no Rivijas Lithuanian: Geraltas iš Rivijos Macedonian: Гералт од Ривија (Geralt od Rivija) Romanian: Geralt din Rivia Russian: Геральт из Ривии (Geralt iz Rivii) Serbian: Гералт из Ривије (Geralt iz Rivije) Slovak: Geralt z Rivie Slovenian: Geralt iz Rivie Spanish: Geralt de Rivia Swedish: Geralt av Rivia Turkish: Rivyalı Geralt Ukrainian: Ґеральт з Рівії (Geralt z Ryviyi)
